value.title: This Startup Just Raised $123 Million To Develop A New Way To Find Medicine
value.excerpt: The traditional approach to developing new drugs is to focus on a single target - a molecule within the body that is essential for a disease to take hold. Hitting this target - by either helping or hindering how it works - is one of the main ways that new medicines are discovered.

value.title: Teaneck just banned facial recognition technology for police. Here's why
